prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The platform allows users to write specifications in plain English, which are then translated into working code, focusing on concepts like personas, knowledge, and actions rather than traditional programming constructs.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Natural language processing, code generation, specifications, plain English, personas, knowledge, actions, programming constructs
